entry.title: 前目的地
entry.content:
[前目的地]简介：

　　时空劳工局特工（伊桑·霍克EthanHawke饰）曾经奉命回到20世纪70年代，以阻止当年给城市造成巨大伤害的恐怖分子“闪灭炸弹客”的破坏活动。谁知他的任务失败，在经过漫长的康复后，他再度踏上征程，发誓要将闪灭炸弹客绳之于法。此番他以酒保身份混迹市井，某天偶然结识了笔名“未婚妈妈”的作家（莎拉·斯努克SarahSnook饰）。作家向他讲述了其匪夷所思的人生。当年作家曾是名叫简的孤儿，性格古怪的她在应聘太空公司失败后，短暂坠入爱河，并生下一名女婴，结果她的人生也发生了翻天覆地的变化。
　　特工打算带着“未婚妈妈”去杀掉那个负心汉，然而真相却并没有那么简单……

[译文]：
Time (bureau of labor agent Ethan Hawke EthanHawke) was ordered back to 1970s, in order to destroy terrorist activities “to stop the city caused great harm to flash bomber”. Who knew his mission was a failure, and after a long recovery, he set foot on the journey again, vowing to knock off the bomb. This time he played the bartender to urban identity, picked up one pseudonym “unmarried mother” writer (Sarah Snook SarahSnook). The writer told him about his fantastic life. When the writer was named Jane orphans, eccentric her at the job space company after the failure of a short fall in love, and gave birth to a baby girl, her life has also undergone changes in turn the world upside down.

entry.title: 两个月亮
entry.content:
[两个月亮]简介：

　　在一个黑暗逼仄的空间内，恐怖小说家李素熙（朴寒星饰）、大学毕业的无业人员崔植浩（金基石饰）、高二女学生朴仁贞（朴真珠饰）从昏迷中醒来，他们彼此间互不相识，也不知道何时来到此地。最初的惶恐过后，三人摸索着从这间地下室出来，进入附近的一幢房屋内。屋里设施齐全，极具生活气息，但是却不见其他的人影。他们试图从这片森林中逃脱，然而始终找不到出口。与此同时，诡异的事件相继在他们周围发生，莫名的恐慌席卷每一个人的心头，黑暗中仿佛存在一个杀人犯随时准备夺取他们的性命。
　　在相互提醒之下，他们失落的记忆渐渐复苏，可是那似乎是难以正视的恐怖真相……

[译文]：
In a dark narrow space, horror novelist Li Suxi (Park Han Byul ornaments), graduated from the University of unemployed Cui Zhihao (Jin Jishi ornaments), sophomore female student Pu Renzhen (Pu Zhenzhu ornaments) woke up from a coma, they did not know each other, do not know when to come here. After the initial panic, the three men groped out of the basement and entered a nearby house. The house was well equipped and full of life, but no other figure was seen. They tried to escape from the forest, but could not find the exit. At the same time, strange events occurred around them, and nameless panic swept through everyone’s mind. There seemed to be a murderer in the darkness ready to take their lives.

entry.title: 催眠大师
entry.content:
[催眠大师]简介：

　　著名的心理治疗师徐瑞宁（徐峥饰）擅长催眠治疗，深得业界的赞扬。但是心高气傲的他却遭遇了职业生涯中最棘手的案件，那就是恩师方教授（吕中饰）推荐给他的女病人任小妍（莫文蔚饰）。一天晚上，女助手Amy（杨凯迪饰）引见来了任小妍，但是这个女病人似乎一直都不太配合，对待医生态度强硬，而且坚信自己能有超自然的能力，瑞宁觉得她没有说出真相，于是开始了催眠疗法。意想不到的是任小妍反而掌控了局面，而真相居然与瑞宁的妻子（胡静饰）以及好友洛雨凇（王耀庆饰）有关，任小妍的身份真正是什么？瑞宁似乎掉进了一个设计好的陷阱里……
　　本片是陈正道导演自《101次求婚》之后的一部力作，徐峥担任了本片监制及主演。

[译文]：
The famous psychotherapist Xu Ruining (Xu Zhengshi) at hypnotherapy, the industry won the praise. But he has been a proud and arrogant case the most difficult occupation career, that is the mentor Professor Fang (Lv Zhongshi) recommended to his female patient Ren Xiaoyan (Karen Mok ornaments). One night, his girlfriend Amy (Yang Kaidi) introduced to Ren Xiaoyan, but the patient appears to have been not too complex, treat the doctor tough attitude, and firmly believe that their ability to have supernatural rinnen, thought she was not telling the truth, then began a hypnotic therapy. The unexpected is as Xiaoyan instead took control of the situation, and the truth actually and rinnen wife (Hu Jingshi) and friends (Wang Yaoqing ornaments) to get about, what really is any Xiaoyan identity? Rinnen seems to fall into a trap of design……

entry.title: 心慌方
entry.content:
[心慌方]简介：

　　警司昆廷（莫里斯•迪恩•温特MauriceDeanWint饰）、监狱专家兼传感器专家伦尼斯（维尼•罗宾逊WayneRobson饰）、医生霍洛韦（尼基•瓜达尼NickyGuadagni饰）、建筑师沃思（戴维•休利特DavidHewlett）、数学系的大学生利文（尼科勒•德搏尔NicoledeBoer饰）和身患孤独症的学者卡赞（安德鲁•米勒AndrewMiller饰），六个素不相识的人，一觉醒来后发现一同身处于由一个个形状相同的立方体组成的结构复杂的高度精密迷宫中！
　　他们唯一的出路只有逃离这座迷宫，然而，一个个立方体尽管外貌相同，然而里面的机关却各不一样，复杂异常。依靠利文数学知识的推理，他们终于以为发现迷宫的运行规律，凭此一次次解开各个机关，迷宫的边缘近在眼前。
　　当他们正欲合力逃出迷宫之际，意外发生了。

[译文]：
Superintendent Quentin (Maurice Dean’s MauriceDeanWint), prison expert and expert Kniss Lun sensor (Vigny Robinson WayneRobson), doctor Holloway (Nicky Guadagni NickyGuadagni), architect worth (David Hewlett DavidHewlett), the Department of mathematics students (Kohler, Gilman de bor NicoledeBoer) and Steve autism scholars (Andrew Kazan Miller AndrewMiller), six people be strangers to each other after wake up, found together in a high precision maze structure one by one of the same shape cube in the complex!

entry.title: 转轮手枪
entry.content:
[转轮手枪]简介：

　　杰克·格林（杰森·斯坦森JasonStatham饰）是一个整日游走于各种赌局的职业赌徒，然而却因为在一次大意的赌局中，被赌界黑势力巨头多西·马查（雷·利奥塔RayLiotta饰）下套，最终锒铛入狱。然而七年的牢狱之灾对杰克来说却并不无裨益，当他发现他的两个狱友分别是国际象棋大师和骗术高手时，便开始了学习深造的道路。刑满出狱的杰克已经身怀绝技，雄心勃勃地决定重返江湖，并报当年一箭之仇。
　　今时不同往日的杰克很快在赌场上如鱼得水所向披靡，还狠狠地羞辱了多西·马查一回。然而马查也不是好惹的角色，恼羞成怒的他下决心要除掉杰克。然而祸不单行，就在杰克在忙着躲避多西的围堵之时，命运竟告知他患上了罕见的血液病，生命只剩下三天期限……

[译文]：
Jack Green (Json Statham JasonStatham) is a full day to go to all kinds of gambling occupation gamblers, but because in a careless gambling, gambling industry giants Dorsey, Macha (dark ray Liotta RayLiotta) set, eventually chained and thrown into prison. However, seven years in prison was a good thing for Jack. When he found out that his two friends were chess masters and deceitful masters, he began to pursue his further studies. Jack has been released from prison to aspiring stunt, decided to return to the political arena, and take their revenge.

entry.title: 八面埋伏
entry.content:
[八面埋伏]简介：

　　莎拉（凯瑟琳·莫瑞斯KathrynMorris饰）、妮可（帕翠西娅·维拉奎兹PatriciaVelasquez饰）、卢卡斯（约翰尼·李·米勒JonnyLeeMiller饰）等七名FBI成员在资深教官杰克·哈里斯（方·基默ValKilmer饰）的带领下，来到离加州不远的弗涅戈小岛，他们将在岛上的虚拟小镇中进行演练，通过推理来找出绰号为“木偶师”的连环杀手。这群探员业务精湛，自命不凡，与世隔绝的小岛之行对他们来说更像一个无聊难耐的假期。
　　但是，他们的狂妄并未持续太久。原本看似平常的推理演习，竟然开始出现死者，所有的逃生之路被切断，众人完全孤立在小岛之上。演习随即演变成一场精心策划的杀戮游戏……

[译文]：
Sarah (Catherine Morris KathrynMorris), Nicole (Patricia Veelazquez PatriciaVelasquez), Lucas (Johnny Lee Miller JonnyLeeMiller) and seven FBI members in senior instructor Jack Harris (gymer square - ValKilmer) of the lead, not far from California to Funiege Island, they will be in town on the island of virtual walkthrough in the reasoning to identify nicknamed “puppet master” serial killer. The highly skilled, pretentious, isolated island tour of the group is more of a boring vacation for them.

entry.title: 生死停留
entry.content:
[生死停留]简介：

　　一部超出想象的心理惊悚电影。
　　一向上进的大学生亨利·拉萨姆（瑞恩·高斯林RyanGosling饰）突然扬言要自杀，心理医生山姆·福斯特（伊万·麦克格雷格EwanMcGregor饰）为了挽救亨利，开始对其进行治疗。奇怪的事情发生了，医生山姆发现亨利经常会说出一些骇人听闻的语言，更加令人不安的是，这些预言竟然一一应验。究竟是什么神秘的力量在操控着亨利？生死一线，中间真的能够停留吗？在女友丽拉·库尔佩（娜奥米·沃茨NaomiWatts饰）的支持和帮助下，山姆能否找到答案，拯救一切？

[译文]：
A psycho thriller movie beyond imagination.

entry.title: 万能钥匙
entry.content:
[万能钥匙]简介：

　　年轻的姑娘卡罗琳（凯特•哈德森KateHudson饰）受雇于老妇人维奥莱特（吉娜•罗兰兹GenaRowlands饰），前往她家照顾她卧病在床的丈夫本（约翰•赫特JohnHurt饰）。维奥莱特的大房子坐落于以神秘习俗和宗教仪式闻名的地区，卡罗琳刚到这里就觉得阴森诡异。随着日子一天天过去，卡罗琳渐渐对这件大房子和古怪的维奥莱特起疑。一次偶然，她从维奥莱特那里得到了一把万能钥匙，用它可以打开这座大房子的所有房间。当卡罗琳走进了隐藏在顶楼的房间时，她看到了令人惊悚的一幕，直觉告诉她，本的卧病在床和维奥莱特以及这间房间有着莫大的关系，她决心揭开这个迷！

[译文]：
Young girl Caroline (Kate Hodson KateHudson) employed by the old lady Violet (Gina Rowlands GenaRowlands) to take care of her, her bedridden husband (John the Hutt JohnHurt). Violet’s large house is situated in a region famous for its mysterious customs and religious ceremonies, and Caroline felt spooky as soon as he arrived here. As the days passed, Caroline gradually to the big house and the strange violet suspicious. By chance, she got a master key from Violet, which used to open all the rooms of the big house. When Caroline went into hiding in the attic room when she saw the terrible scene, intuition told her, this was a remarkable relationship between the bed and the room and Violet, she is determined to uncover the mystery!

entry.title: 春光乍泄
entry.content:
[春光乍泄]简介：

　　黎耀辉（梁朝伟）与何宝荣（张国荣）是一对同性恋人，为了有新的开始，他们怀着美丽的梦想（去看南美洲大瀑布）离开香港来到阿根廷，却在布宜诺斯艾利斯迷了路。黎耀辉想安下心来过日子，无奈何宝荣于夜夜笙歌中放纵着自己的生命，以期找寻更多的刺激，只当黎耀辉是他受伤后的港湾，两人分歧、争吵越来越多，心的距离越来越远。
　　黎耀辉明白过去的日子不可能再复返时，决定离开何宝荣，而正是在他离开后，绝望的意味（对黎耀辉的爱）才在何宝荣的脑海中完整的浮现。

[译文]：
Li Yaohui (Tony Leung) and He Baorong (Leslie Cheung) is a gay couple, in order to have a new start, with their beautiful dreams (see South America falls) from Hongkong to Argentina, but lost in Buenos Aires. Li Yaohui wants to settle down to live, but He Baorong in the night life of indulgence in their own life, to find more excitement, when he was injured after Li Yaohui harbor, the two differences, arguing more and more, the heart of the distance more and more far.

entry.title: 小鞋子
entry.content:
[小鞋子]简介：

　　家境贫寒的男孩Ali（AmirFarrokhHashemian）帮妹妹Zahra（BahareSeddiqi）取修补好的鞋子时，不慎将鞋子弄丢，为了不被父（MohammadAmirNaji）、母（FereshteSarabandi）责罚，他央求Zahra暂时保密，说两人可以替换着穿他的鞋子上学，并答应一定会帮她买双新鞋子。
　　Ali原本指望用他和父亲进城打工挣的钱帮Zahra买双新鞋，父亲的意外受伤打消了他的美梦。看到全市长跑比赛季军的奖品是一双运动鞋时，Ali决定参加比赛，但是他错过了报名日期。几经哀求，老师（DariushMokhtari）破例让实力出众的Ali参加了比赛。比赛场上，Ali不断提醒自己，一定要得第三名！

[译文]：
Poor boy (Ali AmirFarrokhHashemian) to help her sister Zahra (BahareSeddiqi) take mend shoes, accidentally lost shoes, in order not to be father (MohammadAmirNaji), female (FereshteSarabandi) punishment, he begged Zahra temporarily, said two people can replace wearing his shoes to go to school, and promised to help her buy a new pair of shoes.

entry.title: 速度与激情3：东京漂移
entry.content:
[速度与激情3：东京漂移]简介：

　　东京，一直是改装汽车爱好者的天堂，复杂狭窄的街道成为了他们用激情和速度去拼杀的赛道。由于东京街道的弯道极度，在这样的路线上比拼速度，单纯的速度是无法获得胜利。所以，东京的街道赛变成了漂移技术的比赛。男主角尚恩（卢卡斯·布莱克LucasBlack饰）注定是个失败者，在学校毫无朋友，唯一能发泄的地方就只有街头赛车，在经历一次非法赛车被警方通缉后，为躲避牢狱之灾，不得不离开美国，到东京他在军中服役的父亲家中。可是父亲的专制，让尚恩觉得与其格格不入，每天仍然沉迷于街头赛车中。东京赛车极高的漂移技术把尚恩深深吸引，并结识了“漂移之王”DK（布莱恩·泰BrianTee饰）。由于与日本的犯罪集团扯上关系，尚恩不得不为弥补自己的过失再次比赛，而这次比赛的赌注却是自己的生命。一场东京狂飙，就此拉开……

[译文]：
Tokyo has been modified car lovers paradise, complex narrow streets become their passion and speed to kill the track. Because of the extreme corners of the streets of Tokyo, the speed and speed of such a route can not be won. So the street race in Tokyo became a game of drifting technology. Actor Sean (Lucas Black LucasBlack) is destined to be a loser, no friends in the school, the only place only street racing, after a car racing was wanted by the police, to escape jail, had to leave the United States to Tokyo, he served in the army of the father’s house. But the father’s tyranny, let Sean feel they still indulge in the misfits, every day in the street racing. Tokyo car high drift technology attracted Sean, and met the “drift king” (DK Brian Tai BrianTee). As with the Japanese criminal groups involved, Sean had to make up for their own fault again game, and the game is bet your life. A hurricane in Tokyo started here……

entry.title: 洛奇4
entry.content:
[洛奇4]简介：

　　1985年，那时正是美苏两极争霸越演越烈的年代，史泰龙自导自演的洛基系列也出到了第四集，这一系列影片旨在振奋人心、宣扬美国精神。这一集讲述的是洛基（西尔维斯特•史泰龙SylvesterStallone饰）的好友前美国拳王到苏联出战他们研制的拳击机械人，不敌对手最终身遭不测。为了帮好友复仇和维护国家荣誉，洛基决定再次出马。
　　出战前，洛基进行了一系列精心的准备工作，他深入到大自然，利用自然的艰苦条件刻苦训练。当一切准备妥当，洛基和苏联拳王――拳击机械人的决斗展开了！

[译文]：
In 1985, it was US Soviet hegemony intensified era, Stallone directed the rocky series is up to fourth sets, this series is intended to promote the spirit of the United States, exciting. This episode is about, a former friend of Loki (Sylvester Stallone, SylvesterStallone) who went to the Soviet Union to develop a boxing robot that lost its opponent and was eventually killed. In order to help a friend revenge and national honor, Loki decided to again run.

entry.title: 洛奇5
entry.content:
[洛奇5]简介：

　　洛基电影的第五集。自从上一集洛基（西尔维斯特•史泰龙SylvesterStallone饰）击败了苏联的拳击机械人后，他决意归隐，从此过些安安乐乐的日子。阴险商人杜克（东尼•布顿TonyBurton饰）是拳击经理人，利用拳击手赚黑心钱，他高薪引诱洛基投到他门下，洛基不为所动，断然拒绝了他的邀请。
　　退隐后的洛基还是没有离开拳击，他的好友拳击教练米克死后留下了一座拳击训练馆，洛基继承了米克的事业，每天到拳击馆里训练新人。年轻拳手绰号“机枪”的涛米极具天分，洛基倾其所有传授米涛拳术，米涛在洛基的帮助很快就跻身了优秀拳手的行列。成名后的米涛被名声和金钱所蒙蔽，投到了杜克的帐下，成了杜克阴谋的一枚棋子。
　　怒不可遏的洛基决定用自己的手段拯救米涛！

[译文]：
The fifth episode of the rocky movie. Since the last set of Loki (Sylvester Stallone SylvesterStallone) defeated the Soviet boxing robot, he resolved to seclusion, then had some Ann Lele days. Sinister businessman Duke (Tony bouton TonyBurton) is a boxing manager, the boxer earn HeiXinQian, he paid to him under the door to lure rocky, rocky unmoved, flatly refused his invitation.

entry.title: 洛奇3
entry.content:
[洛奇3]简介：

　　在第二次击败宿敌——黑人拳王阿波罗·克里德（CarlWeathers饰）后，当初贫民窟出身的穷小子洛奇（西尔维斯特·史泰龙SylvesterStallone饰）逐渐走上事业的顶峰。他先后十次卫冕，创造了重量级拳王的不败神话，受到来此各界的疯狂追捧。原本打算引退的洛奇受到了黑人拳击手克鲁伯（Mr.T饰）的挑战，他不顾经纪人米基（BurgessMeredith饰）的阻拦，决然走入擂台，却遭遇了生涯中久违的惨败。在此之后，米基因心脏病去世，洛奇也陷入消沉。就在这关键时刻，阿波罗出现在洛奇面前，他要帮助这个昔日的劲敌重新振作起来，寻找属于自己的荣光……
　　本片荣获1983年青年艺术家奖最佳动作片奖。

[译文]：
In the second - beat rival black champion Apollo Creed (CarlWeathers), was born a poor boy slum Lodge (Sylvesster Stallone SylvesterStallone) gradually to the pinnacle of his career. He has defended ten times successively, created the heavyweight champion’s unbeaten myth, has been pursued crazily from all walks of life. Originally intended to retire the lodge by black boxer Cruber (Mr.T) challenge, in spite of his agent Mickey (BurgessMeredith) of the block, so into the ring, but suffered a career long. After that, the MI gene died of heart disease and the lodge was plunged into depression. At this critical moment, Appollo appeared in front of the lodge. He wanted to help the old enemy again and find his own glory……

entry.title: 洛奇2
entry.content:
[洛奇2]简介：

　　洛基•巴尔博厄(西尔维斯特•史泰龙SylvesterStallone饰)战胜了世界冠军拳王阿波罗，却很快花光了比赛赢得的奖金。为了养家糊口，他尝试了很多的工作，均未成功。他再三考虑，决定做回本行，重新开始他的拳击生涯。
　　阿波罗对于上次的失败也非常介怀，他多次给洛奇制造麻烦，逼迫他重出江湖。虽然太太反对，但洛奇仍然紧锣密鼓，开始做好比赛的准备，他的决心终于得到亲人的支持。在亲友的协助下，他苦练拳术，走上赛场，和阿波罗展开惊险搏斗。

[译文]：
Rocky Balbo Maher (Sylvester Stallone SylvesterStallone) beat world champion Appollo, but soon spent all the winnings he had won. He tried a lot of work to support his family, but he failed. After much deliberation, he decided to go back to work and start his boxing career again.

entry.title: 洛奇6：永远的拳王
entry.content:
[洛奇6：永远的拳王]简介：

　　转眼30年过去，往日的荣光渐渐不再。曾经的传奇拳王洛奇（西尔维斯特·史泰龙SylvesterStallone饰）生活平淡乏味，心爱的妻子亚德里安（TaliaShire饰）因癌症去世，自己与儿子的关系又分外紧张，他终日坐在所开的小餐馆里追忆往昔，谁也不会想到这位拳王退休后的人生竟如此落寞。
　　是时，新一代的拳王横空出世，年轻的梅森·迪克逊（AntonioTarver饰）统治者重量级冠军的头衔。在体育频道工作的波利（BurtYoung饰）突发奇想，策划了一场新老两代拳王的世纪对决。梅森渴望在比赛中向拳迷们证明自己的实力，洛奇则希望在此感受万众欢呼呐喊的狂热气氛，他们怀着各自的心愿重返拳台……

[译文]：
In the twinkling of an eye, 30 years later, the glory of the past is no longer. Once the legendary Rocky Balboa (Sylvesster Stallone SylvesterStallone) life dull, his beloved wife Adrian (TaliaShire) died of cancer, and the relationship between the son and his exceptionally tight, he was always sitting in a small restaurant opened in recalling the past, who would not think of the champion after retirement life so lonely.

entry.title: 明日边缘
entry.content:
[明日边缘]简介：

　　未来世界陷入外星人入侵的恐慌中，军事演说家凯奇少校（汤姆·克鲁斯TomCruise饰）畏惧上战场，他从没想过将军（布莱丹·格里森BrendanGleeson饰）会让他去指挥即将开始的“诺曼底战役”，拒绝接受命令之后将军居然恶整了他，那就是把他当做逃兵扔进了军营中。凯奇被归入了J小队中进行战斗，战役的第一天就惨死在战场，没想到这一死让他拥有了时空循环的能力，而唯一相信他的人就是被称为“全金属战士”的丽塔·沃拉塔斯基（艾米莉·布朗特EmilyBlunt饰）。二人开始了时空循环作战，在训练凯奇的同时他们发现了控制时间的奥秘，这与外星人“主脑”欧米茄有关，但是唯一能取得胜利的方法就是让凯奇不断死去、不断重启时间。在不断重复登陆那天的战斗的同时，凯奇越来越不想失去丽塔……

[译文]：
The future of the world into an alien invasion panic, military commander Cage speaker (Tom Curise TomCruise) fear on the battlefield, he never thought the general (Brendan Gleeson BrendanGleeson) will allow him to command the upcoming “battle of Normandy”, refused to accept the order after the general had whole evil to him, that is to regard him as a deserter in in the camp. Cage belongs to the J team in the battle, the first day of the battle had died in the battlefield, I did not expect this death let him have the ability to time cycle, and the only people who believe in it is called “full metal warrior” Rita Vora Tarski (Emily Blunt EmilyBlunt). Two people began operations in the training cycle time, Cage at the same time they found the secret of time control, which is related to the alien mastermind of OMEGA, but the only way is to let Cage win continue to die, continue to restart time. On the day of repeated landings, Cage did not want to lose Rita any more……

entry.title: K星异客
entry.content:
[K星异客]简介：

　　一位自称普洛特的戴墨镜男人（凯文•斯帕西KevenSpacey饰）突然出现在纽约中央公园车站。他自称来自天琴座附近距地球一千光年的K-PAX星，以超光速来到地球考察。普洛特被当作精神病人入住曼哈顿精神病院，受到马克•鲍威尔医生（杰夫•布里奇斯JeffBridges饰）的治疗。马克认为普洛特是妄想症患者，却又对普洛特的奇怪行为和不可思议的天文知识将信将疑。同时，普洛特的到来在病院中其他病人中造成轰动，人人都希望能被选中随普洛特回K-PAX星。马克医生竭尽全力希望找出普洛特的真实身份，却没想到自己竟在此过程中越来越被普洛特的理论所说服。普洛特的真实身份究竟为何？
　　本片被提名美国科幻、幻想和恐怖电影协会最佳男主角（凯文•斯帕西）。

[译文]：
A person claiming to be the man wearing sunglasses Plotkin (Kevin spaacey KevenSpacey) suddenly appeared in the Central Park of New York station. He claims to be from Lyra near one thousand light-years from earth to planet K-PAX, with a super light came to earth to study. Plotkin as a mental patient in Manhattan psychiatric hospital, by Mark Powell (Geoff doctor Bridges JeffBridges) treatment. That is Mark Plotkin paranoid, but strange behavior of Plotkin and unbelievable astronomical knowledge about. At the same time, the arrival of Plotkin caused a sensation in the hospital in the other patients, everyone wants to be selected with Plotkin back to K-PAX star. The doctor did his best to find Mark Plotkin’s true identity, but did not think of himself in this process is more and more convinced by Plotkin theory. Why Plotkin’s true identity?

entry.title: 恐怖星球
entry.content:
[恐怖星球]简介：

　　脱衣舞女切丽（罗丝·迈格温饰）边跳钢管舞边流泪，她厌倦并想着逃离这样的生活，一切烂透了。另一边，附近军事基地在研发一种药物的过程中发生事故，病毒气体弥漫出来，附近周围的人们变成了僵尸，而切丽那赖以为生、修长惹火的右腿也被僵尸扯了下来。还好，她身边还有男友雷（弗莱迪·罗瑞格兹饰）的存在。
　　医院被血洗，警察们无力阻挡僵尸的进攻。雷和其他幸存的人们汇集到小店，组成武装部队，展开与僵尸对抗的血战中。雷甚至给切丽装上一只假肢，而这只假肢其实是一把超强武器，可以当机关枪也可以当迫击炮。于是，切丽成为猎杀僵尸的超级女斗士。

[译文]：
Stripteaser Cherie (Rose Magwinque) side pole dancing edge tears, she was tired and want to escape from this life, everything sucks. On the other side, near the military base accident in developing a drug, virus gas filled out, people around the zombies, and the living hot Cherie and slender zombie right leg was torn down. Fortunately, she also has a boyfriend ray (Freddie Roygd ornaments) presence.

entry.title: 生人勿进
entry.content:
[生人勿进]简介：

　　遥远的北欧地区，瑞典的斯德哥尔摩一片银装素裹，寒气逼人。12岁少年奥斯卡（KåreHedebrant凯尔•赫德布朗特饰）生活在一个单亲家庭，他在学校形单影只，饱受欺负；回家后则偷偷搜集关于各类凶杀案的剪报，或者深夜挥着小刀在树上发泄着自己的愤怒。
　　新搬来的小孩爱莉（LinaLeandersson莉娜•莱纳德尔森饰）走进了奥斯卡的生活，他们慢慢成为朋友，并逐渐产生爱情。而就在此时，奥斯卡无意中发现爱莉一个令人毛骨悚然的秘密……
　　本片改编自瑞典小说家约翰•林德科维斯特（JohnAjvideLindqvist）2004年的同名畅销书，并荣获2008年翠贝卡电影节最高奖、2008高森博格电影节最佳北欧电影奖及柯达最佳摄影奖。

[译文]：
The Nordic region far, Sweden Stockholm a snow, cold pressing. 12 year old Oscar (K reHedebrant Kell Hird Blount) living in a single parent family, he suffered bullying at school; home extremely lonely, is secretly collecting cuttings on all kinds of murder, or night waving knife to vent their anger on the tree.
